verses.verse: מִזְמ֥וֹר <S%H4210><s%> miz-Mor A Psalm לְתוֹדָ֑ה <S%H8426><s%> le-to-Dah; of praise הָרִ֥יעוּ <S%H7321><s%> ha-Ri-'u Make a joyful noise לַ֝יהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh unto the LORD כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz. all ye lands

עִבְד֣וּ <S%H5647><s%> 'iv-Du Serve אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD בְּשִׂמְחָ֑ה <S%H8057><s%> be-sim-Chah; with gladness בֹּ֥אוּ <S%H935><s%> Bo-'u come לְ֝פָנָ֗יו <S%H6440><s%> le-fa-Nav, before his presence בִּרְנָנָֽה׃ <S%H7445><s%> bir-na-Nah. with singing

דְּע֗וּ <S%H3045><s%> de-'U, Know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- that יְהוָה֮ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh ye that the LORD ה֤וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu Himself אֱלֹ֫הִ֥ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him he [is] God הֽוּא־ <S%H1931><s%> hu- Himself עָ֭שָׂנוּ <S%H6213><s%> 'A-sa-nu [it is] he [that] hath made; וְלֹא ve-lo כוְלֹ֣ו <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo not קאֲנַ֑חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> 'a-Nach-nu; ourselves עַ֝מּ֗וֹ <S%H5971><s%> am-Mo, us and not we ourselves [we are] his people וְצֹ֣אן <S%H6629><s%> ve-Tzon and the sheep מַרְעִיתֽוֹ׃ <S%H4830><s%> mar-'i-To. of his pasture

בֹּ֤אוּ <S%H935><s%> Bo-'u Enter שְׁעָרָ֨יו׀ <S%H8179><s%> she-'a-Rav into his gates בְּתוֹדָ֗ה <S%H8426><s%> be-to-Dah, with thanksgiving חֲצֵרֹתָ֥יו <S%H2691><s%> cha-tze-ro-Tav [and] into his courts בִּתְהִלָּ֑ה <S%H8416><s%> bit-hil-Lah; with praise הֽוֹדוּ־ <S%H3034><s%> ho-du- be thankful ל֝֗וֹ lo, בָּרֲכ֥וּ <S%H1288><s%> ba-ra-Chu unto him [and] bless שְׁמֽוֹ׃ <S%H8034><s%> she-Mo. his name

כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for ט֣וֹב <S%H2896><s%> Tov [is] good יְ֭הֹוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh For the LORD לְעוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> le-'o-Lam [is] everlasting חַסְדּ֑וֹ <S%H2617><s%> chas-Do; his mercy וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> ve-'ad- against דֹּ֥ר <S%H1755><s%> dor [endureth] to all וָ֝דֹ֗ר <S%H1755><s%> va-Dor, generations אֱמוּנָתֽוֹ׃ <S%H530><s%> e-mu-na-To. and his truth
